text: Polyceratocarpus is a genus of flowering plants in the family Annonaceae. All known species are native to continental Africa. Species include:Polyceratocarpus. The Plant List. * Polyceratocarpus angustifolius, Paiva * Polyceratocarpus askhambryan-iringae * Polyceratocarpus germainii Botique * Polyceratocarpus gossweileri, (Exell) Paiva * Polyceratocarpus laurifolius, Paiva * Polyceratocarpus microtrichus, (Engl. & Diels) Ghesq. ex Pellegr. * Polyceratocarpus parviflorus (Baker f.) Ghesq. * Polyceratocarpus pellegrinii, Le Thomas * Polyceratocarpus scheffleri, Engl. & Diels * Polyceratocarpus vermoesenii Robyns & Ghesq. ==References== Category:Annonaceae Category:Annonaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Polyceratocarpus
